Today I am announcing my intention to amend the Senate tax bill to repeal the individual mandate and provide bigger tax cuts for middle income taxpayers.

The mandate repeal is a promise we all made and we should keep. It also allows an additional $300 billion+ in tax cuts.

A vote for the Republican tax bill is a vote to cut Medicare by $400 billion over the next decade. https://twitter.com/thehill/status/930499603581034497 QT @thehill JUST IN: CBO: GOP tax bill could trigger $25 billion in Medicare cuts http://hill.cm/5rmvlBM http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOnMdRXWkAcrFoO.jpg
